lang-dir: The writing direction of the language. Should be 'rtl' (right-to-left) or 'ltr' (left-to-right).
banner-text-1: Appears below the 'piTime' logo in the home page. First line
banner-text-2: Appears below the 'piTime' logo in the home page. Second line
banner-design-button: Appears on the button that redirects the user to the design section.
about-title: The title of the about section.
design-title: The title of the design section.
